summary: Adds Bjorn to the game. A drunken hunter/barbarian-kindof guy, who lives in a shack in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
Bjorn lives in hes little shack in Solitude, just next to The Winking Skeever. There he drinks mead, wine, sings and just makes hes days go by. 
I havnt bound him to a quest yet, but the thought is that he is fed-up with living for nothing, and would love to follow the Dragonborn on its adventures.
Just a simple guy who is incredibly good in 2h weps and prefers light armor.
He is even marriable, if you fancy him enough.
author: Wylda
